analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Bhidurāyaṁ, bhikkhave, kāyo, viññāṇaṁ virāgadhammaṁ, sabbe upadhī aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā”ti.
analyzed: bhidurāya bhikkhave kāyaḥ viññāṇam virāga dhamma sabbe upadhī aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāma dhammā

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
